title: Did Philadelphia Eagles, vulture players, kneel during the National Anthem in 2017?
subtitle: The White House claimed that an event with Super Bowl heroes was cancelled because of disagreement over kneeling during the anthem before the match, but no Eagle player bowed to protest during the regular season.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Players on Philadelphia Eagles in protest during the national anthem throughout the regular national football season in 2017.
